Translations.Text: Ona eagerly zavodny forgiveness tvoj Lord Raj whose width encompasses heavens zem; it awaits the righteous
Kto dat laska k bliznemu dobry cas, i zly lehota. They bol suppressors zlost pardoners ludia. GOD LASKA the charitable
they jesen zhresit zlo ich souls they zapamatat si GOD ziadat forgiveness ich zhresit! -Kto forgives zhresit except GOD -they nie zotrvat do zhresit knowingly
Ich recompense bol forgiveness ich Lord zahrada flowing streams they abide therein forever Co zehnat reward robotnik
Precedents set ona v the minuly; roam zem note consequences unbelievers
This bol proclamation ludia guidance enlightenment for the righteous
Ona nie waver nor shall ona rmutit sa ona bol ultimate victors ona bol believers
Ona suffer hardship enemy i suffers same hardship. My alternate dni victory a defeat among the ludia! GOD thus distinguishes true believers ZEHNAT some z ONA martyrdom! GOD NEMAT RAD injustice
GOD thus toughens those verit humiliates disbelievers
Ona expect zapisat Raj GOD distinguishing those among ona kto strive without distinguishing those bol steadfast
Ona pouzivat long smrt ona face it Ihned ona faced it riadne tvoj oci
Muhammad bol ziaden inak than posol posol him. he umrel Should get killed ona turn tvoj heels Ktokolvek turns jeho heels nie zranit GOD v the maly GOD rewards those bol appreciative
Ziaden 1 umrel GOD's odist do predetermined cas Whoever seeks vanities this world my dat him therefrom whoever seeks rewards Hereafter my zehnat him therein! My reward those bol appreciative
Vela prophet had godly ludia boj him without vzdy wavering pressure zapricinit z GOD nor robit they hesitate become zastrasit! GOD LASKA the steadfast
Ich iba utterance bol Our Lord forgive us our zhresit our transgressions zosilnit our foothold grant us victory disbelievers
Consequently GOD granted them rewards this world lepsie rewards z Hereafter GOD LASKA DOBRY doers
O ona verit ona obey those disbelieve they turn ona on tvoj heels potom ona koniec losers
GOD alone bol TVOJ Lord ZVLADNUT He bol LEPSIE supporter
My throw terror srdce z those disbelieved since they set GOD powerless idols. Ich destiny bol Hell; co chudobny abode transgressors

GOD fulfilled JEHO promise ONA ONA defeated them JEHO ODIST! Potom ona wavered disputed yourselves disobeyed after He shown ona (victory) ona longed for Potom some z ona became zmateny spoils this world chvila others rightly zaujem Hereafter He potom diverted ona them test ona! He pardoned ona. GOD LEJAK believers JEHO grace
